name: solana-security-cookbook
description: Educational resource for Solana security best practices with Anchor and Pinocchio examples

scripts.build:anchor: npm run build:anchor:01 && npm run build:anchor:02 && npm run build:anchor:03 && npm run build:anchor:04 && npm run build:anchor:05
scripts.build:anchor:01: cd examples/01-missing-signer-check/anchor/vulnerable && anchor build && cd ../secure && anchor build
scripts.build:anchor:02: cd examples/02-incorrect-pda-validation/anchor/vulnerable && anchor build && cd ../secure && anchor build
scripts.build:anchor:03: cd examples/03-arithmetic-overflow/anchor/vulnerable && anchor build && cd ../secure && anchor build
scripts.build:anchor:04: cd examples/04-reentrancy-risk/anchor/vulnerable && anchor build && cd ../secure && anchor build
scripts.build:anchor:05: cd examples/05-unsafe-account-closure/anchor/vulnerable && anchor build && cd ../secure && anchor build
scripts.build:pinocchio: npm run build:pinocchio:01 && npm run build:pinocchio:02 && npm run build:pinocchio:03 && npm run build:pinocchio:04 && npm run build:pinocchio:05
scripts.build:pinocchio:01: cd examples/01-missing-signer-check/pinocchio/vulnerable && cargo build-sbf && cd ../secure && cargo build-sbf
scripts.build:pinocchio:02: cd examples/02-incorrect-pda-validation/pinocchio/vulnerable && cargo build-sbf && cd ../secure && cargo build-sbf
scripts.build:pinocchio:03: cd examples/03-arithmetic-overflow/pinocchio/vulnerable && cargo build-sbf && cd ../secure && cargo build-sbf
scripts.build:pinocchio:04: cd examples/04-reentrancy-risk/pinocchio/vulnerable && cargo build-sbf && cd ../secure && cargo build-sbf
scripts.build:pinocchio:05: cd examples/05-unsafe-account-closure/pinocchio/vulnerable && cargo build-sbf && cd ../secure && cargo build-sbf
